content:
Your three co-chair musketeers just finished an action-packed prep call for this Thursday's weekly call. Agenda here

To get our two Project Scope Statements into the January HL7 ballot cycle, we need to review & vote on them this week. Please prepare. See the agenda, which contains links to the documents.

  • You'll also see notes that both of our teams (Patient Corrections and Patient Contributed Data) have now scheduled their own weekly calls.
  • To help organize that, we (led by Debi) created two Confluence calendars, for Project timelines (not yet populated) and Events aka meetings
